Pi Miler

Engineering Student Council presents the 8th Annual Pi-Miler race! This 3.14 mile run/walk will occur on Sunday, March 20th at 10 a.m. starting and finishing outside of Thornton Hall. Registration for the race will begin at 9 a.m the day of.

Register and pay online (https://www.picatic.com/pimiler2016) to save time and money! $11 for students (when entering uva_student promotional code), $16 for all others. The cost is $20 for all race-day entries.

The first 100 participants to register will receive an awesome Pi-Miler t-shirt! Prizes will also be awarded to the top finishers in multiple categories! Food (pie too) and drink is provided at the race!

All proceeds will be donated to the Patients and Friends Research Fund at the UVA Cancer Center to benefit Cancer Research. For more information regarding this center, please visit http://healthfoundation.virginia.edu/patientsandfriends

For more information, visit our Facebook page!
